      • deleteOpportunity

        public java.lang.String deleteOpportunity(java.lang.String url,
                                 java.lang.String oauthToken,
                                 java.lang.String opptyID)
        Deletes an oppty via the rest api, user used to get Oauth token must be sys admin Will fail test if request is unsuccessful
        Parameters:
        url - Base SalesConnect URL
        oauthToken - Oauth token for sys admin
        opptyID - Oppty to be deleted
        Returns:
        response as a string

      • deleteOpportunity

        public java.lang.String deleteOpportunity(java.lang.String url,
                                 java.lang.String oauthToken,
                                 java.lang.String opptyID,
                                 java.lang.Boolean stopIfFail)
        Deletes an oppty via the rest api, user used to get Oauth token must be sys admin
        Parameters:
        url - Base SalesConnect URL
        oauthToken - Oauth token for sys admin
        opptyID - Oppty to be deleted
        stopIfFail - true if unsuccessful request should cause test failure, false if the test should continue
        Returns:
        response as a string
